sentences.en: ‘I warned you not to phone me, ’ he said evenly.
sentences.cn: “我告诫过你不要给我打电话。”他平静地说。

sentences.en: "Is Mary Ann O.K?" — "She's fine," she said evenly.
sentences.cn: “玛丽·安还好么？”——“她很好，”她平静地说。

sentences.en: Apply the glue evenly over both surfaces.
sentences.cn: 在两面均匀地涂上胶水.

sentences.en: Distribute the topping evenly over the fruit.
sentences.cn: 将配料均匀地撒在水果上。

sentences.en: Don't make the paste too thick, or it will not spread evenly.
sentences.cn: 不要把酱弄得太稠, 否则不易涂均匀.

sentences.en: He looked at Ellen, breathing evenly in her sleep.
sentences.cn: 他看着埃伦，她正呼吸均匀地睡着。

sentences.en: I'll try to spread out the work evenly.
sentences.cn: 我会尽力把工作平均分配.

sentences.en: Make sure the paint covers the surface evenly.
sentences.cn: 要确保油漆均匀地涂在表面上。

sentences.en: No two players could be more evenly matched.
sentences.cn: 再也找不到两个这样势均力敌的选手了.

sentences.en: Sprinkle sugar evenly over the top of the cake.
sentences.cn: 把糖均匀地撒在蛋糕上.

sentences.en: Stand with your legs apart and your weight evenly distributed.
sentences.cn: 双腿分开站立,平均分散身体的重量.

sentences.en: The meat is divided evenly and boiled in a stew.
sentences.cn: 那块肉被均匀切成小块放到炖菜里煮熟。

sentences.en: The new machine distributes seeds evenly and quickly.
sentences.cn: 这新机器播种又快又匀.

sentences.en: The profits will be split evenly between the three of us.
sentences.cn: 利润将由我们三人平分。

sentences.en: They must choose between two evenly matched candidates for governor.
sentences.cn: 他们必须在两位不相上下的州长候选人之间作出选择。

words.tran_cn: [数] 偶数的；平坦的；相等的
变平；变得可比较；成为相等
均匀地；平衡地；平坦地；平等地
